name: Chypre Type
creator: 6400c6dfb7d333edde543612
tagline: An 80s style chypre with notes of Cardamom
description: Travel back in time to the opulent 80s with this chypre fragrance, featuring a special note of cardamom. Top notes of bergamot and mandarin lead to a heart of jasmine, rose, and patchouli. The base notes of oakmoss, musk, and amber provide a warm finish. The addition of cardamom adds a unique twist to this classic scent. Perfect for those who want to make a statement and leave a lasting impression.
